sf276:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Śrāvastī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍa’s monastery.
sf276:2.1:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }Now at
that time, the whole disk of the moon had been covered by the
demon-lord Rāhu.
sf276:3.1:
p { margin-bottom: 0.25cm; line-height: 115%; background: transparent }
Then, when the disk of the moon glowed intensely red, that deity,
frightened, terrified and shocked, with hair standing on end,
approached the Blessed One.
